ReferenceDocuments.name: A questionnaire to assess Psy
ReferenceDocuments.description: A questionnaire to assess Psychopathy, also called Sociopathy, is a trait related to Antisocial Personality Disorder, a disorder characterized by a contempt for the feelings and rights of people.  Individuals high in Psychopathy are often irritable and aggressive, act impulsively, and manipulate others for personal gain

DataElement.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21
